name: Cranberry Negroni
description: Cranberries—a staple on the Thanksgiving dinner table—are a perfect ingredient for cocktails this time of year. Their ruby red hue brightens up any cocktail party and the juice brings a little life to familiar cocktails.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the gin, Campari, vermouth, and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Strain into a cocktail glass. Gently fold the orange twist and squeeze over the cocktail to express oils. Garnish with twist and serve.
